title: #31: The RCP Team Is Back Together
description:
Jim Clemente and Laura Richards are back from their travels and discuss with Lisa Zambetti the last six weeks on the road, Reeva Steenkamp in the news and our next case.

Thank you to our sponsors Audible and Blue Apron! You can support the show and visit them here:

www.blueapron.com/realcrime

www.audible.com/realcrime
